channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 10/19/2023 INC#0211

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0211; 05:29AM; 3504 W 3rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/45ykC7b; #Koreatown; *Address Corrected*. 90 LAFD Firefighters took just 34 minutes to extinguish stubborn flames, largely confined to the attic of an 18,300 square foot two-story apartments over commercial building. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; AR1 BC11 BC14 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E211 E220 E229 E235 E26 E3 E52 E6 EA1 EM11 EM14 RA13 RA3 RA6 RA806 SQ21 T11 T20 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0211; 04:55AM; 3455 W 3rd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/45BP8NM; #Koreatown; PRELIM: Two Story Apartments Over Commercial with Fire in Attic.; FS 6; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC14 BC18 BC5 CM20 CM22 E11 E13 E203 E211 E220 E229 E235 E26 E3 E52 E6 EM11 EM14 RA13 RA3 RA6 RA806 SQ21 T11 T20 T29 T3 T35 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#0198; 04:40AM; EB 10 Fwy x 60 Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/48WHcJJ; #Downtown; PRELIM: 2 Vehicle Collision. Four Patients Total. One Is Deceased at Scene. Three Transported In Critical Condition. No Further Details. Media Inquires: CHP Central L.A. (Log #296).; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E10 E14 E17 E210 E9 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA14 RA17 RA209 T10 T9; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#1578; 08:06PM; 205 E Opp St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q3OSRB; #Wilmington; After the fire was extinguished, a 12 year-old male civilian resident was discovered to have sustained a non-life threatening burn injury to his hand. He has been taken to an area hospital by LAFD Paramedics in fair condition. No other injuries have been reported. The cause of the fire remains under investigation.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E285 E38 E49 E85 RA38 RA85 T38 T85; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1578; 07:37PM; 205 E Opp St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q3OSRB; #Wilmington; 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 12 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire in one second floor unit at a 3,200 square foot two-story apartment. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E285 E38 E49 E85 RA38 RA85 T38 T85; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1578; 07:25PM; 205 E Opp St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q3OSRB; #Wilmington; PRELIM: Offensive firefight at a two-story garden style apartment building with fire in one second floor unit. All occupants are reported to have safely exited.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E285 E38 E49 E85 RA38 RA85 T38 T85; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Update SUSPICIOUS FIRES MEDIA ADVISORY - ; 02:15PM; #ShermanOaks; In regard to the suspicious fires last night at 13838 W Ventura Boulevard and 4646 N Nagle Avenue, we can now confirm these fires are "intentional acts", and that a suspect has been arrested. While the fires remain the focus of an ongoing LAFD / LAPD investigation, any statement regarding the suspect, their arrest, criminal record, and the specific charges they are facing, are in the domain of the Los Angeles Police Department's Major Crimes Division.; FS 78 / 102; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; Brian Humphrey

Contained - Brush Fire; INC#0699; 10:44AM; 5010 N Griffin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/38UqBcp; #MontecitoHeights; The first arriving LAFD Firefighters have driven/hiked to the remote location near the Walnut Forest Trail and Seco Valle Trail in Ernest Debs Regional Park to contain and extinguish small fire, that appeared to be an unattended makeshift fire pit. There were thankfully no wind, and the fire was prevented from extending into nearby brush. No injury. No structure threat. No evacuation.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO2 BC1 BC2 BP44 BP47 E1 E12 E16 E201 E250 E290 E44 E47 E55 EM1 H3 H4 H7 HA3 HA4 HA7 RA12 T1 T50 T90; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#0699; 10:24AM; 5010 N Griffin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/38UqBcp; #Montecito Heights; PRELIM: LAFD ground response to a small fire among grass and heavy brush in remote terrain near the Walnut Forest Trail and Seco Valle Trail in Ernest Debs Regional Park. No wind. No structure threat. No evacuation.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AO2 BC1 BC2 BP44 BP47 E1 E12 E16 E201 E250 E290 E44 E47 E55 EM1 H3 H4 H7 HA3 HA4 HA7 T1 T50 T90; CH5; 12; Brian Humphrey

Update Fatality Structure Fire; INC#0468; 08:58AM; 8766 N Matilija Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/45zlCrW; #PanoramaCity; There are now a total of *six* patients from this fire: The adult female civilian who is deceased at scene; and *five* other civilians (including one child), all in fair condition. Two patients are declining ambulance transport, and *three* others are being taken to area hospitals by LAFD Paramedics for treatment following exposure to smoke. The age, gender and affiliation of the patients, and their circumstances at the time of the fire have yet to be determined. The fire cause remains under active investigation.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AP7 AR11 AR21 AR25 AR34 AR38 AR9 BC12 E289 E298 E37 E474 E98 EM10 RA75 RA77 RA87 RA89 RA98 RA989 SO1 T89 T98; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey
